SEARCH
Package Interface.consensus

Interface ConsensusInstance<T extends Number & Comparable<T>>

Type Parameters:
T - Type of the variable on whose value agreement is trying to be achieved. Must be a number.
All Known Implementing Classes:
AsynchConsensusInstanceSkeleton, AsynchDLPSW86Instance, ConsensusInstanceSkeleton, FCAInstance, SynchDLPSW86Instance
public interface ConsensusInstance<T extends Number & Comparable<T>>
Representation of the execution of an Approximate Agreement Algorithm, from inception to termination. Should not be reused.

  • Method Details

    • approximateConsensus_other

      CompletableFuture<T> approximateConsensus_other(ApproximationMessage msg)
      Method called when a new approximate consensus instance is started by another process.
      Parameters:
      msg - The first message to be processed.
      Returns:
      Completable Future containing the result of this instance of consensus

    • approximateConsensus_self

      CompletableFuture<T> approximateConsensus_self()
      Method called when new approximate consensus instance is started by the calling process.
      Returns:
      Completable Future containing the result of this instance of consensus

    • consensusStillPossible

      boolean consensusStillPossible()
      Check if necessary conditions to guarantee correctness in the execution of the algorithm are still met.
      Returns:
      True if conditions are met, false, otherwise.

    • getGroupState

      Map<? extends AddressInterface,? extends ProcessInterface> getGroupState()
      Getter for the consensus instance's snapshot of the group's constitution
      Returns:
      Group Constitution as a mapping of group members to their respective address.

    • getReqID

      RequestID getReqID()
      Getter for the unique identifier of this consensus instance.
      Returns:
      Unique identifier of the consensus instance.

    • getMetrics

      ConsensusMetrics getMetrics()
      Get the object containing several relevant metrics to profile the execution of this instance of consensus
      Returns:
      Object storing metrics relative to an execution of an approximate consensus algorithm.

    • exchange

      void exchange(Byte msgType, ApproximationMessage msg, AddressInterface q)
      Method called as handler of an approximation message. Consumes the message, which may advance the state of the consensus instance.
      Parameters:
      msgType - Type of message (initialization, approximation, etc.)
      msg - Object containing the payload of the message
      q - Address of the message's sender
